string.value: What? #p9270032# in CBD is looking for me again? I wonder what could it be this time!

No surprise to find out that she wants a new dress! She asked me to gather 50 #t4000035#, 50 #t4000021#, and 10 #t4021003# this time. I really hope that she is satisfied with her dress!

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/50#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/50#k
#t4021003# #r#c4021003#/10#k
Phew... Finally, #p9270032# was able to get all dresses she ever wanted! But speaking of fashion, I am sure that I look much better!

You... Yes! Stop looking around... Oh hi~ I can't believe I've met you the third time in such a short period of time! Now listen~ I have another problem now. A few hours ago while I was doing my routine window shopping, I saw another dress that I fell in love with at first sight!

The tailor of the shop told me that this dress is originated from Chinese Custom~ It is the traditional costume of Chinese. It looks tight and firm though, but I knew it could stand out my good figure by wearing it~ I love it so much! Erm... But, as you probably know... it is not for free... Please help me, please...........?
I knew that my beauty strikes on the right person! Geez~ I need #b50 #t4000035#, 50 #t4000021# and 10 #t4021003##k for the tailor to make out the awful Costume!
Come on~ It's my last request! You wouldn't want to reject a pretty lady's offer right?
Where could I find extra leathers and tablecloths? Do you have any idea?

Thank you so much~! I knew you will never let me down. Now, I can imagine how beautiful and lady-like I can be with this Chinese costume on! For 3 consecutive helps from a kind-hearted person like you... Please accept this.
Ehh.... I don't think you have the materials I need for the dress. Please get me #b50 #t4000035#, 50 #t4000021# and 10 #t4021003##k!
